parameters.html:
Lucas Gontijo de Moraes

AI engineer

Phone: +55 62 98537-2793 Github: /Luucasgontijo Email: lucas@veridianbr.com Portfolio: https://lucasgontijo.vercel.app/

ABOUT ME

Python-first AI/ML Engineer with 3+ years of experience designing scalable automation workflows powered by LLMs and intelligent systems. Currently leading backend automation for Brazil's national digital health platform, where I architect Python-based services integrating AI/ML capabilities with traditional automation to serve over 100,000 monthly users. My technical foundation combines strong Python development with hands-on AI/ML engineering and backend automation experience. I specialize in building robust API integrations, optimizing PostgreSQL databases, and developing event-driven architectures that seamlessly integrate LLM-based solutions using OpenAI, Claude, and LangChain implementations. I design complex automation workflows using n8n orchestration, develop Python microservices for data processing, and manage SQL databases with RabbitMQ messaging for reliable operations. My experience includes tackling complex automation challenges from REST API integrations connecting healthcare systems to intelligent document processing pipelines leveraging LLMs for content analysis and decision-making. My toolkit spans Python backend development, SQL database optimization, REST API design, Git version control, and cloud platform integration. I'm proficient with automation platforms like n8n and experienced with containerization and CI/CD pipelines, enabling me to build automation solutions that are both technically robust and intelligently adaptive to business needs.

SKILLS

Machine Learning & AI: LLMs, NLP systems, LangGraph, LangChain, deep learning models, PySpark, Pytorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn

Low-code: N8n & Zapier

MLOps & Automation: CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, containerization, real-time monitoring, model lifecycle management

Cloud & Data Engineering: GCP, AWS, Azure; distributed data processing with PySpark

Programming Languages: Python, C++, Javascript, SQL, bash

Languages: Portuguese (Native), English (Fluent), Spanish (Working Proficiency)

EXPERIENCE

Python and n8n software developer 23 - 25

Federal University of Goiás UFG

Developed intelligent automation workflows for health screening processes using fine-tuned language models and RAG systems, integrating EvolutionAPI and healthcare APIs to create AI-driven appointment scheduling, automated data collection, and personalized follow-up procedures through custom-trained models optimized for medical domain applications.

N8n and automation developer Fev 25 - Jun 25

APL digital marketing company

Development of marketing automations using Python and N8n, with custom workflows and API integrations. Implementation of AI agents to enhance operations and lead generation, translating business needs into efficient, scalable solutions.

N8n automation developer May 25 - present

DevScouter

Development of of RAG automation workflows to automate processes, integrating tools. I use N8n, platforms such as Slack, web scraping tools, relational databases, and other external systems — all with a focus on operational efficiency.

Generative AI Developer May 25 - present

Advanced Knowledge Center for Immersive Technologies

Development of RAG technologies with focus on producing microlearning content using generative AI features such as speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and multimodal content generation.

EDUCATION & SPECIALIZATIONS

Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering 22 - 23

Federal University of Goiás UFG

Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering 23 - present

Federal University of Goiás UFG

Specialization in Front-End Software Development 24 - 25

META

Computer Science and Python Programming 23 - 24

MITx

IBM AI Engineer 25 - present

IBM
